org.aserg.utility

Class SqlUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aserg.utility.SqlUtility

  • public class SqlUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for creating, initializing and providing Connection and ResultSet of the Databases on the basis of Query Accessed. It has Queries that are accessed by other classes to get the results

      • getSqliteConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getSqliteConnection()

        getDionaeaConnection

        This function will initialize the connection to the Sqlite Database This function will be called by all populators that need connection with logsql.sqlite database

        Returns:
        dionaeaConnection
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException,SQLException

      • getMysqlConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getMysqlConnection(java.lang.String database,
                                     java.lang.String password)

        getKippoConnection

        Function will initialize the connection to the all mysql Database MysqlDataSource is reciprocal of DriverManager
        Returns:
        mysqlConnection
        Throws:
        SqlException
        See Also:
        html

      • closeDbInstances

        public static void closeDbInstances(java.sql.Connection con)

        closeDbInstances

        Function will close all the instances of databases i-e ResultSet, Statement, Connection will test whether the connections, statement and connection are initialized Need to close in the sequence (1)ResultSet (2)Statement (3) Connection

        Parameters:
        con -

      • getResultSet

        public static java.sql.ResultSet getResultSet(java.lang.String query,
                              java.sql.Connection con,
                              java.lang.String time)
        Function will return the resultset on the bases of query, time. Function tests whether the called database id mysql or sqlite If function finds order_id its orders the results accordingly
        Parameters:
        query, - con, time
        Returns:
        resultSet
